snippet: Mr. Friday, president of the University of North Carolina from 1956 to 1986, oversaw vast growth and a response to federal desegregation orders.
abstract: William C Friday, longtime leader of University of North Carolina, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Friday, president of the University of North Carolina from 1956 to 1986, oversaw vast growth and a response to federal desegregation orders.

headline.seo: William C. Friday, University of North Carolina President, Dies at 92
headline.main: William C. Friday, University of North Carolina Leader, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: William C. Friday, University of North Carolina Leader, Dies at 92
